value:
What a lovely country this is...
The people, the scenery—it all has
a certain glow to it. Just like home.

I tried to gather the souls of those
in my realm who were being taken
by Hel. I had nearly all of them...

Are you feeling well? You are always
welcome to speak with me. I will not
ever turn you away.

Whew... The amount of walking
in this place has made me hungry.
Would you care to eat with me?

I got some sweets in anticipation
of enjoying them with Eir. They're
delicious. Would you like to try?

I am Ymir. I come with a message
from $Nf.

The warmth of life's flow
fills me...
A glimmering spark of life...

Without any change, this will not
do for long.
For me? I'm delighted!

I am Ymir, the dragon of life. If my
life's spark might aid you, I am glad
to offer it.

If you don't mind, I would like
to take a moment to express
my gratitude.$k$pBecause of you, Eir is safe and
in good spirits.$k$p...Hm? How can I tell? Hee hee...
She can be a bit difficult to read,
but I know when she is happy.$k$pFor her to enjoy her life as she does,
and to want to keep on living... Those
things are your doing. So thank you.$k$pYou were able to do what I could
not—a failure I've regretted for a long
time. But there is no need now.$k$pThis, too, must be fate. In saving
Eir, you have saved me as well.
And I cannot thank you enough.
Do no more harm!
Never again!
Life is delicate...
Rebirth awaits.
Eir... Forgive me...
I am Ymir, dragon of life and steward of its realm.
*surprise* How bold you are, to test a dragon.
Our realm was beautiful once, flush with the sweet glow of life.
All living things are precious to me—every plant and every creature.
Eir was such a dear little girl.
If only I could have saved them! At the very least, if I could have protected Eir…
You hold in your hands the lives gathered here. Allow me to ease that weight.
Just so.
This way then?
As you wish.
